data.name: Atria
data.detailed_description:
On stardate 24/43/5356 Koretech (the multi galatic conglomerate with a monopoly on the Robotics, Space force and Military weapons market) plans to do a controlled destruction of the galaxy in order for them to collect incredibly valuable dark matter resources. Either spend your time grovelling over supplies and resources flying planet to planet in an attempt to buy a ticket from Koretech and Escape before the galaxy is destroyed or gather weaponry to rebel against Koretech and destroy the corrupt conglomerate before any more damage is done. Get ready to battle it out with Sirens (Mutated creatures caused by the X-1 virus) and K.A.D’s (Koretech Assault Droids) and survive. Will you submit or rebel?

NEW GAMEMODE: Descent mode is a waved based shoot ‘em up gamemode. In which you kill Sirens and K.A.D’s to gain and collect loot. Over time more and more enemies spawn making it harder to survive in the confined space. Maps such as Koretech Station, Mars island and Koretech T.H.U.L.

Players can expect Survival tools, Weapon and gun play, An explorable universe and Much more. Players must fight against droids and sirens to collect resources in an attempt to either fight against Koretech or submit to them. Atria uses basic FPS moment system of W,A,S,D. You can collect packages to get loot and use attachments and extras.
Over the course of development the game will become more advanced and performance will be optimized.

data.short_description: Fight and survive against Assault droids and Sirens in an attempt to defeat the corrupt conglomerate known as Koretech and save the galaxy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5 10TH GEN 6 CORE or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4095MB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: IINTEL CORE I7 11TH GEN 8 CORE or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 12GB GTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
